attributes.actor: Frank O'SullivanA '''Night's Watch messenger''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 1
attributes.9: note<nowiki>*</nowiki> - Uncredited appearance==References==ReflistCategory:CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Status: AliveCategory:Unnamed CharactersCategory:Recurring CharactersCategory:Characters from Westeros

sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He announces the arrival of a [[Ravens|raven]] to [[Lord Commander of the Night's Watch|Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]].<ref>"[[The Pointy End]]"</ref> He congratulates [[Jon Snow]] for protecting Mormont from an attack by a [[Wights|wight]] the next day.<ref>"[[Baelor]]"</ref>
